problems.title: Problems
problems.subtitle: We explore merchants' expectations and potential problems to simplify their experience.

problem1.title: Value loss due to inflation
problem1.description: Merchants see how their sales in Argentine pesos lose value day by day due to inflation. They don't understand how to protect their income without changing how they collect.

problem2.title: Unnecessary technical complexity
problem2.description: Customers arrive at the store and cannot understand how to pay with cryptocurrencies. Everything seems complicated, they need wallets, technical knowledge, and end up abandoning the purchase.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about MidatoPay

general.question: How does MidatoPay work?
general.answer: MidatoPay allows merchants to generate QR codes that customers can scan. Customers pay in Argentine pesos using their preferred method, and MidatoPay automatically converts those pesos to cryptocurrencies, protecting the value of sales against inflation.

general.question: What cryptocurrencies does MidatoPay accept?
general.answer: MidatoPay accepts multiple cryptocurrencies including USDT, BTC, and ETH. The merchant can choose which cryptocurrency they want to receive payments in when generating the QR code.

general.question: Do I need technical knowledge to use MidatoPay?
general.answer: No, MidatoPay is designed to be simple and easy to use. You just need to generate a QR code and your customers can pay normally. The conversion to cryptocurrencies is automatic and transparent.

pagos.question: How long does the conversion take?
pagos.answer: The conversion from Argentine pesos to cryptocurrencies is instantaneous. Once the customer completes the payment, the merchant receives confirmation in seconds.

pagos.question: Is it safe to use MidatoPay?
pagos.answer: Yes, MidatoPay uses blockchain technology to ensure transaction security. All conversions are performed securely and transparently, with confirmations on the blockchain.

pagos.question: Is there any cost to use MidatoPay?
pagos.answer: MidatoPay offers a transparent solution with competitive fees. Costs are based on transaction volume and are clearly communicated before each operation.

hackathon.title: MidatoPay Wins Hackathon and Advances to Seed Phase at Starknet Startup House
hackathon.excerpt: We are excited to announce that MidatoPay has won 3rd place in a hackathon and has been selected to participate in the Seed Phase of Starknet's Startup House program in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
hackathon.content:
We are happy to share great news! MidatoPay won 3rd place in the Starknet Hackathon among more than 1,400 projects from around the world and has been selected to participate in the Seed Phase of Starknet's Startup House program in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

This recognition fills us with pride and drives us to continue building a real solution for interoperable payments between fiat and crypto for LATAM merchants.

The hackathon victory validates our vision of protecting merchants from inflation through blockchain solutions.

We greatly thank **Cavos**, **Starknet Foundation**, and **Crecimiento Argentina** for the support, trust, and energy that accompanied us throughout the process.

From November 12-16, 2025, our team will participate in the Buenos Aires Startup House, an intensive 5-day program designed to scale projects from MVP to established startups. This program will provide us with:

â€¢ Upgraded tech architecture
â€¢ A go-to-market plan tailored to our product
â€¢ First customer acquisition strategy
â€¢ Clear 90-day growth roadmap with follow-up support
â€¢ New connections with mentors and Starknet builders

The program includes free accommodation, meals, mentorship, and specialized workshops. We are committed to leveraging this unique opportunity to accelerate the development of our platform and take MidatoPay to the next level.

Stay tuned for more updates as we continue building the future of payments for merchants.
